name: Crypt Lord
description:
Cryptlord is an RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure. Prepare to be immersed in a dark and mysterious world filled with horrors and secrets.

The game features a unique sacrifice system, where you can offer up items you find to gain reverence, which allows you to increase your stats. This system ties progression directly to item discovery, so you will not be punished for playing how you want to play.

As you explore the world, you'll discover ancient runes that you can slot into your equipment. These runes give you the power to unleash a variety of effects such as doing blood damage at night, allowing you to teleport, or the ability to make enemies explode upon death. Mix and match these runes to create a playstyle that truly fits how you want to play.

You have complete freedom to explore the world and progress through the game as you see fit. Using the world map, you can quickly jump into any dungeon that you think you are capable of taking on. The Cryptlord lies in wait at the Ancestral Hall, ready for you to face him whenever you're ready. The choice is yours in Cryptlord.

Join the discord to get involved with the games development and keep up with news!

Please Note; Crypt Lord is under active development, and this means there will be bugs, issues and glitches, and save files may not work in newer versions. This alpha is for windows only.
